casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Donald Lee CURTIS. No. 122A16-1. Supreme Court of North Carolina. April 21, 2016. Narendra K. Ghosh, Chapel Hill, Attorney at Law, for Curtis, Donald Lee. Katherine A. Murphy, Assistant Attorney General, for State of North Carolina. James R. O'Neill, District Attorney, for State of North Carolina.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 21st of April 2016 by Defendant:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 21st of April 2016."
